original_text: She riseth also while it is yet night, and giveth meat to her household, and a portion to her maidens.
korean_text: 밤이 새기 전에 일어나서 자기 집안 사람들에게 음식을 나누어 주며 여종들에게 일을 정하여 맡기며

sentences.original_text: She riseth also while it is yet night
and giveth meat to her household
and a portion to her maidens
